summary: Implements a command‑line driven training pipeline that loads a citation graph (Cora or Citeseer) with DGL, splits nodes into train/validation/test sets, constructs a JKNet model, and runs a full‑graph training loop using PyTorch optimizers, reporting performance metrics.
business_intent: Provides a ready‑to‑run example for researchers and engineers to benchmark and experiment with the JKNet graph neural network on standard citation datasets, facilitating rapid development and evaluation of node classification solutions.
